ELEVATIONS
S1

pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides multiple building elevations for the dairy goat barn, showing the North, South, East, and West views. Key components include wall sections, door and window openings, and overall building dimensions. The elevations help in understanding the external appearance and structural layout of the barn.

pages.page_overview_summary: The roof plan sheet details the layout of the roof trusses and ventilation openings for the barn. It provides essential information on the roof framing and structural support systems, ensuring proper ventilation and structural integrity.

pages.page_overview_summary: The main floor plan sheet outlines the layout of the ground floor, including structural columns and room designations such as goat pens, nurseries, and utility areas. It provides a comprehensive view of the functional spaces within the barn.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
CLARE BRUBACHER
108'-0" X 188'-0" DAIRY GOAT BARN
083777 Southgate Rd. 08
Mt. Forest, ON N0G 2L0
DETAILS & GENERAL NOTES
S6
3 29 21
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL CONSTRUCTION NOTES:
1. THE WORKSHOPS ON THIS SET OF CONSTRUCTION DOCUMENTS ARE TO BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE SPECIFICATIONS.
...
DESIGN LOADS:
1. ROOF SNOW LOAD: 1.2 KPA (25 PSF)
2. WIND LOAD: 0.5 KPA (10 PSF)
3. EARTHQUAKE LOAD: 0.1 KPA (2 PSF)
4. THE BUILDING IS DESIGNED TO LOW HUMAN OCCUPANCY.
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides a mix of construction details and general notes, including foundation details and structural connections. It includes important specifications and design loads that govern the overall construction and safety of the barn.

pages.page_overview_summary: The foundation plan sheet details the layout of the foundation, including footing details and structural walls. It provides essential information for the construction of the barn's base, ensuring stability and support for the entire structure.
